description: This file defines the central routing configuration for a Flutter application. It manages route parsing, navigation, authentication guard logic, and page widget selection based on URL paths. It includes the AppRouter class, route parser, and router delegate, and references multiple page widgets and an auth provider.

classes.name: AppRouter
classes.description: Provides the main routing configuration with a static router instance, encapsulating route setup.

classes.name: _SimpleRouteParser
classes.description: Parses route information from URL into string paths and restores route info from paths.

classes.name: _SimpleRouterDelegate
classes.description: Manages navigation state, build navigation widget tree, and enforces authentication guards based on URL paths.

methods.name: parseRouteInformation
methods.description: Converts RouteInformation into a route path string.

methods.name: restoreRouteInformation
methods.description: Converts a route path string back into RouteInformation.

methods.name: setNewPath
methods.description: Updates the current navigation path and notifies listeners.

methods.name: setNewRoutePath
methods.description: Sets a new route path asynchronously, used during navigation.

methods.name: _guardPath
methods.description: Checks whether a route requires authentication and redirects to login if the user is not authenticated.

methods.name: _buildBody
methods.description: Returns the widget for a given route path.
